structure.unit: Sec. 2-3002. - EACH METER THE BASIS FOR CHARGES AND RATES, ETC.

law.catch_line: EACH METER THE BASIS FOR CHARGES AND RATES, ETC.
law.text:
The Bureau shall employ such staff as it deems necessary to carry out its duties and responsibilities and in accord with its approved budget. Employees of the Bureau shall not be considered as employees of the City for any purposes whatsoever. (Ord. No. 1992-904, §6, 1-7-92)
